text: Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy is a platform video game that was published by Activision. It serves as a remaster and remake of the first three Crash games: Crash Bandicoot, Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back and Crash Bandicoot 3: Warped. ==Other websites== *Crash Bandicoot's Official website Category:2017 video games Category:Crash Bandicoot (video game series) Category:Activision video games Category:Toys for Bob games Category:Vicarious Visions games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video game compilations Category:Video game remasters Category:Video games about dinosaurs Category:Xbox One games
title: Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy
